entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 04:55 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
